pages.text: It is easy to confuse stalicripe with rocky growth, such is its affinity for the earth.$(br2)Whether stone given life as a plant, or plant calcified to stone, it has a strong affinity with the earth.$(br2)Once reborn from the heat of a $(l:crafting/pyres)pyre$(), it becomes a $(l:herbs/stalicripe#renew)renewable$() resource.

pages.title: Renewability
pages.text: Once obtained, stalicripe can be planted in any of the five types of $(l:resources/elemental_soil)elemental soil$().$(br2)It's not necessary to match the element of the soil with the element of stalicripe.$(br2)Once mature, paler clusters of soft, stone-like growth are strung together with calcified tendrils of woody growth.
